short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances your experience on 7Cups website. Adds a lot of useful information to website pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BetterCups is a Chrome extension designed to improve user experience of 7Cups users.
BetterCups contains features 7Cups currently lacks, or improves features 7Cups website already has. 

Of many features (many of which you can turn on or off, depending on your needs), most notable ones are:
- Advanced information about your own profile.
- Extended information about other people's profiles.
- Ping support - define your preferred nicknames in settings. Also supports sound on ping.
- Message highlights (ping/mod).
- Option to hide excessive caps in messages.
- Custom badges
- Message counters on chat page
- Reply to a person button.
- Dashboard bubblewrap ASMR
- Custom profile picture border.
- Quick chat replies.
- Hide profile picture mute feature
- Listener Quality of Life features
- Improved report menu

Enjoy your stay at 7Cups with BetterCups! üòÅ
